name: EYE 2.0
description:
You are a young Eye, on a quest to not die in a harsh world of perpetually aggravated crows and badly connected platforms.

Use the arrow-keys to move, double-tap the "up" arrow to double-jump, and utilize the magic-infusing monocles. READ THE IN-GAME INSTRUCTIONS THAT LEAVE YOU VULNERABLE TO CROW ATTACKS.

In case you haven't realized already, avoid the crows.
